p.k: Tonight Lola and Pat are taking part in a huge flash mob event. They have rehearsed extensively and everything is set. Except that in the meantime Hoodie has given Pat fleas. So many fleas that they take control of Pat. Our hero has to dispose of the intruders while stopping the Guanos from kidnapping Hoodie. Naturally if their sworn canine enemy is out of the game the pigeons intend to take advantage of the situation. Pat has no time to scratch!
